name: The Right One
description:
This game was made during GMTK game jam in 48 hours.
How To Play?
W/A/S/D or arrow keys
Story
You are one confused half heart who is desperately searching the right other half you are connected to.. That connection guides you inside the dark paths which are full of the wrong ones.
Your spiritual connection which is bonded to the right one guides you on your journey.
SPOILERS AFTER THAT POINT
